value:
$WmMPID_年明けカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_NewYear18,Face|You've arrived. Once this battle is
decided, we'll be free.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けタクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_NewYear18,Face|I can't believe our luck. The year's
barely started and we're already
being made to fight!$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|It's not all bad, is it? At least I get to
spend time with my little sister.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|This is our first real battle at the dawn
of a new year.$k$pShall we begin?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|Does this mean...you've
demonstrated your strength? We owe
you our thanks for that.$k$pThe next time we meet, we'll lend you
our strength in return. Farewell until
then!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Well, that wraps this mission up. But
since we're here...how about we do
hatsumode too?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|"Hatsumode"? What's that?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|It's a sacred rite where everyone
prays at a shrine and sends their
wishes to the gods.$k$pHmm... And our prayer should be,
"May Anna and the Order of Heroes
have a very profitable year!"$k$pOr maybe something like, "May the
Order of Heroes receive a bigger
budget in the new year!"$k$p$EFace_Cool|No, more like, "May I receive a great
amount of money!" No, "An obscene
amount of money!"$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Ohh, I understand. But what should I
wish for? Hmm...$k$pWhat will your wish be, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|I think...I'll wish for world peace.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|There you go again! Always with the
perfect answer.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Well, I'll wish to get along with my
brother. That way, the two of us won't
ever grow apart!$k$p$EFace|Oh, but I don't want to grow apart
from $Nu or
Commander Anna, or the Heroes...$k$p$EFace_Smile|I've got it! I'll wish to get along with
everybody, forever!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well, let's go, everyone! It's about
time this rite got started. First, put
your hands together like this...$k$p$EFace_Smile|May this new year be as good as the
last.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|May this be a good year.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|May this be a good year!$k$p$Sbs150|
